body_html:
It now seems I can only use the GPUs that have a P8 status (not the ones with P0)

body:
It now seems I can only use the GPUs that have a P8 status (not the ones with P0)

```
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 375.51                 Driver Version: 375.51                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
```
